duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare monthly financial statements and variance reports for assigned properties.
Maintain balance sheet account schedules and submit to VP, Accounting for review.
Assist with general journal entries, bank reconciliations, and weekly cash reporting.
Review and code income, expense, and capital purchases.
Perform bank reconciliations and maintain fixed asset tracking systems.
Assist Cash Management Department with daily reporting requirements.
Provide additional financial statement and general ledger analysis as needed.

education_certification.credential: BS in Accounting or Finance required. Yardi, AppFolio, Entrata, and OneSite experience a plus.
